universal_guidelines: Use 'Outfit' for all Headings and 'Inter' for Body.
Dark Mode is the DEFAULT and PRIMARY mode. Use white text on dark backgrounds.
Do NOT use pure black (#000000). Use #030305 or #0A0A0A.
Use Indigo-500 (#6366F1) as the primary brand color for Actions (Buttons, Links).
Use Teal-500 (#14B8A6) for positive metrics (Growth, Profit).
Glassmorphism (backdrop-blur) is mandatory for sticky elements and overlays.
Use 'Bento Grid' layouts for feature showcases.
Marketing pages must use custom HTML/Tailwind, NOT standard Shadcn cards.
Dashboard pages should use Shadcn components but styled with the 'Performance Pro' dark theme.
Do not use gradients for text if readability is compromised.
Ensure all images have lazy loading and alt tags.

instructions_to_main_agent.step_2: Update tailwind.config.js to include the custom colors (background: #030305, etc).
instructions_to_main_agent.step_3: Create the Landing Page first with the Hero section using the abstract purple background.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_4: Build the Dashboard Layout (Sidebar + Header) using the glassmorphic style.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_5: Implement the core features (Audit, Content Engine) using the Bento Grid layout.
